aushadha, saniparakshaka nishpaditha, aahara nishpaditha, krushi rasayana ha pashu nishpaditha, nishpadanaye aanayanaye ha bedaharime niratha morisan pielsi, mita pera handunwanu labuwe, je.el. morisan san and jons (silon) limitad yanuweni. 2013 juli masaye di morisan samagame bahuthara kotas himikarithwaya, hemas samuhaye anubaddhitha samagamak wana hemas manufakcharin (pud) samagama wisin athpath karaganna ladi.

janapriya gayakayeku wana "ti. em. jayarathna"1944 aprel masa 13 wana dina shri lankawe dodangodadi upatha labiya.1978, 1979, 1980 saha 1987 wasara waladi ohu shri lanka janadhipathi sammanayen pidum labu athara 2006 wasaredi rayigam teli sammana uleledi hondama gayakayata himi sammanayen pidum labiya.ti.em. jayarathna thama gayana jiwithaya pasupela gayana shilpiyeku lesa aalambha karana ladde, sunil aariyarathna wisin rachitha saha premasiri kemadasa wisin sangithawath karanalada la hiru dahasak githaya gayana kirimath samagaya.1978 wasaredi ohu ohuge mulma kasat patiya tharanga weluma 1 namin elidakwana ladi.
widuru murthi shilpaya pilibandawa aya pasal kalayen pasuwa hadara atha.
katha kale shri lankawe prawina kalakaruwaku wu dharmasiri gamage mahathaya.
yudaye athuru palayak wu kaberi daruwan men ma sudu daruwan da ape kanthawan wetha dayada kara thibenu eda apata daknata haki wiya.
anthimata kelawena kota thiyena somiya balannath api innam.
eheth dan kohomada eya palawaharinne.
enam nil warnaya bhawitha kirima sidu kala yuthuya.
